text:
@NYGovCuomo N.Y. Governor forced care homes to take CoVid19 patients. How many died because of @NYGovCuomo 
Lets hope the investigation gets underway soon! Family members need to file lawsuits against Cuomo! As well as DA needs to look at charges of manslaughter!
